title: Whole Wheat Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
full_text:
Whole Wheat Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
16 1/2 servings (1 cup)
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
350
g
arrowroot flour
350
g
sorghum flour
450
g
tapioca starch
450
g
white rice flour
(or substitute
millet flour
)
200
g
brown rice flour
(or substitute
sorghum flour
)
100
g
potato flour
200
g
milk powder
20
g
guar gum
Directions
Whisk together all the ingredients in a bowl. Store in airtight container at room temperature for up to 6 months.
Special Equipment
Digital scale
